definition: to be well-informed
to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
quick/alert/efficacious/effective/to come true/spirit/departed soul/coffin
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
well-informed source/person with inside information
pinyin: xiao1 xi5 ling2 tong1 ren2 shi4

sentences.english: E. g. He is a well-informed man.
you have to be well-informed as to how to go about being an actor.
sentences.chinese: 你要消息灵通，知道如何当演员。

sentences.english: Example : She's a really hep student .
sentences.chinese: 她真是一个消息灵通的学生。

sentences.english: This all helps keep me informed.
sentences.chinese: 这全能让我一直消息灵通。

sentences.english: The info provided from this informer was found to be inaccurate.
sentences.chinese: 这位消息灵通人士所提供的情报已经被发现是错误的。

sentences.english: Especially here, people are very well-informed and very well-spoken.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是在这里，人们消息灵通，口才也好。

sentences.english: The scandal was dug up by a well-informed journalist.
sentences.chinese: 这件丑闻是被一位消息灵通的新闻记者发现的。

definition: fast and abundant (news)/clever/effective
well-informed source/person with inside information
pinyin: xiao1 xi5 ling2 tong1 ren2 shi4

definition: inside story/inside information
to make inquiries/to try to find out/to pry
hearsay/gossip
to learn sth through hearsay/to get wind of sth
eyes and ears/sb's attention or notice/information/knowledge/spies
secret agent/detective
inside information/the ins and outs of the matter/how things stand/what's up
local bully/tyrant/regional mafia boss
to respond instantly/to act at once on hearing the news
leading figure/bigwig
insider information
to make discreet inquiries/to scout out
to possess great magical power/to possess remarkable abilities
to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
